title: Gemini 3.1 Unveiled: Infinite Context for Code
summary: Gemini 3.1 introduces a context window that scales indefinitely, allowing entire repositories to be loaded into memory without RAG.

title: Claude 4 Beta: Enhanced Reasoning Capabilities
summary: Claude 4 Beta focuses on multi-step reasoning for complex refactoring tasks, reducing hallucinations by 40%.

title: MCP 1.5 Release
summary: MCP 1.5 adds support for streaming tool outputs and native file system watching.

title: Claude 3.7 Release Notes
analysis: Supports native mermaid graph rendering. Reduced tokens for visual outputs.

title: Gemini 3.1 Flash Updates
analysis: 2M context window standard. Faster JSON mode.
